<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 1"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Heal Companion](/Feats.aspx?ID=1764) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Ranger" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=136" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 132 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
an animal companion

</column>

---

You have a deep devotion to your animal companion that enables you to magically heal their wounds. You gain the [_heal companion_](/Spells.aspx?ID=771) warden spell and a focus pool of 1 Focus Point.
name: Heal Companion
